casebody.data:
STATE
v.
SMITH 2019-0771 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 6, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motion for leave to file delayed appeal. Motion granted. Appellant shall file a memorandum in support of jurisdiction within 30 days.
